example.text: Syracuse University recently did a study showing that low and middle-income Americans are five times more likely to be subjected to an IRS audit. While former Speaker Nancy Pelosi claimed that Republicans were passing this bill to protect corporations and millionaires, I pointed out on Twitter that House Democrats voted several times against an amendment preventing the new resources at the IRS from targeting Americans making less than $400,000 a year.

Depoliticizing Retirement Accounts Last week, I introduced bipartisan legislation with US Senator Mike Braun (R-IN) and US Senator Joe Manchin (D-WV) ending Biden's politicization of retirement accounts. Biden's Department of Labor issued a rule permitting retirement plans to consider environmental, social, and governance (ESG) investing.
